section.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
section.text: This part modifies, limits, or supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 5 U.S.C. § 7002) ("Act"), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that Act, 15 U.S.C. § 7001(c), or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act, 15 U.S.C. § 7003(b).

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 19 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
